meanings.sent1: The cake was divided into sixteenths for all the guests to have a fair share.
meanings.sent2: In the recipe, you need to add two sixteenths of a cup of sugar to the mixture.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally cut the pizza into sixteenths instead of eighths, but we still enjoyed it.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like it was broken into sixteenths after the breakup.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map was divided into sixteenths, each piece leading to a different clue.

meanings.sent1: The melody was filled with quick sixteenths that added a lively rhythm to the song.
meanings.sent2: The pianist played the sixteenths flawlessly, showcasing their musical talent.
meanings.sent3: The sixteenths in the symphony danced around the room, creating a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like a series of joyful sixteenths in the concert hall.
meanings.sent5: The composer carefully arranged the sixteenths to create a harmonious piece of music.

meanings.definition: A sixteenth of an inch in measurement.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter needed to cut the wood to a precise length of sixteenths of an inch.
meanings.sent2: The seamstress measured the fabric with accuracy, ensuring each piece was exactly sixteenths long.
meanings.sent3: The tiny bug was only a sixteenth of an inch in size, barely visible to the naked eye.
meanings.sent4: The raindrops fell lightly, each one no larger than a sixteenth of an inch.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler crafted the delicate necklace with beads measuring only sixteenths in diameter.
